hero.title: dding-dong
hero.subtitle: When code is done, the doorbell rings.
hero.description: A Claude Code plugin that alerts you with sounds and OS notifications on task completion, errors, and input requests.
hero.notificationPreview: Task complete! Your code is ready.

items.title: Cross-Platform
items.description: Works on macOS, Linux, and WSL. Automatically detects your environment and audio tools.

items.title: Sound Packs
items.description: Choose from built-in packs — default, retro 8-bit, or musical piano chords. Create your own too.

items.title: TTS Voice
items.description: Generate custom voice notifications with Qwen3-TTS. Clone your own voice for a personal touch.

items.title: Quiet Hours
items.description: Set quiet hours to silence notifications during focus time or late-night sessions.

items.title: Flexible Config
items.description: 5-stage config merge: defaults → global → project → local → env vars. Override anything, anywhere.

items.title: Korean & English
items.description: Full bilingual support. Notification messages, setup wizard, and all skills in both languages.

gallery.heading: What sounds will you hear?
gallery.description: 3 built-in sound packs, 5 events each. Click to preview.

ttsVoice.heading: Make it speak in your voice
ttsVoice.description: Generate TTS voice notifications with Qwen3-TTS. Clone your voice with as few as 3 seconds of audio.

cards.title: Voice Cloning
cards.description: As few as 3 seconds of audio is all it takes to clone your voice. Every notification sounds like you.

cards.title: 5 Event Voices
cards.description: Unique voice lines for each event — task complete, error, input required, session start, and end.

cards.title: One Command Setup
cards.description: Run /dd-tts-pack and follow the prompts. Auto-downloads Qwen3-TTS model on first use.

preview.heading: Listen to a sample
preview.description: Voice clones generated with Qwen3-TTS — try both Korean and English
